description:
The second generation Apex offers an improved GPS, free downloadable worldwide maps, a more precise heart rate monitor, music, and more. Thanks to a new GPS chipset and updated antenna design, you now get a single frequency connection to up to 5 satellite constellations. More connections, means better reception and more accurate tracks of your runs, rides, and swims. Outfitted with the next evolution in Coros’ optical heart rate monitor technology, the Apex 2 provides the most precise pulse metrics ever seen on a Coros device. Preloaded with dozens of sport profiles, for both indoor and outdoor activities, there’s a mode for everyone. While you use the Apex 2, it learns how you train, letting you know how to adjust your workout schedule and intensity, it will even let you know when you should take a rest day. No matter how hard you crush in in the gym or on the trails, there are factors we just can’t control, like the weather. The onboard barometer tracks environmental pressure changes, alerting you when a storm is on its way. And daily sun tracking lets you know how much daylight you have left, as well as sunrise and sunset times. Robust smartwatch functionality will keep the Apex 2 on your wrist outside of training hours. When synced with a phone running the free COROS app, you can receive texts, social media alerts and email, share and download workouts, review activities, and more.

  • Sport profiles include: running (indoor, outdoor and trail), cycling (indoor and outdoor), swimming (pool and open water), triathlon, gym cardio, strength training, hiking, snowsports and more
  • Multisport mode lets you transition between different activities within a single workout
  • Strength training program has more than 200 exercises, selectable muscle groups, auto-detects reps, counts sets and provides a comprehensive breakdown in the app with body-mapped exercise tracking, including how many reps you did for each muscle group
  • Integrated running power meter
  • Updated optical heart rate monitor uses an array of LEDs and sensors to provide more precise heart rate data than previous generations and can even provide blood oxygenation levels (SpO2)
  • Recovery advisor prevents over-training and helps maximize training intervals
  • Advanced training metrics: training status, 7-day load, race predictor (5k, 10k, half and full marathon), training focus, effort pace, and more
  • Free maps are available to download via the Coros web app via your computer
  • Music playback: load your favourite MP3s directly to your watch via USB connection to your computer. Holds up to 2000 songs so you can leave the phone at home, just pair your Bluetooth™ headphones or speaker and hit play
  • Camera control lets you control your action camera right from your wrist. Works with the select GoPro and Insta360 cameras
  • Touchscreen and intuitive dial, lets you scroll or swipe through modes, settings and metrics
  • Intelligent battery profiles provide 7 hours with single band GPS and music, 30 hours with standard GPS, and 17 days in smart watch mode
  • Fast charging can take the watch from 0% to 100% in less than 2 hours
  • Redesigned antenna connects to GPS, GLONASS, BeiDou, Galileo, and QZSS satellite constellations, reducing connection time by up to 50%
  • Free COROS app has downloadable workouts, workout breakdowns, training plans, activity tracking information, third party training app integration e.g., Strava™, Training Peaks™, etc., watch customization and much more (via your phone’s Bluetooth™ connection)
  • Bluetooth Smart and Wi-Filets let you connect to a variety of different sensors, including: power meters (cycling and running), cadence and speed sensors, foot pods, heart rate belts and more
  • Daily activity tracking with calories burnt, steps, floors climbed and sleep tracking
  • ABC data via internal altimeter, barometer and compass
  • Light and strong titanium bezel with a scratch resistant PVD coating, paired with a virtually scratchproof sapphire crystal face, protect the watch and keep your screen easy to read
  • Regular firmware updates add new features and improvements
  • Bright colour screen is easy to see in all conditions and is fully customizable
  • In the box: Apex 2, charging cable and documentation
name: Coros Apex 2 Premium Multisport Watch - Unisex
